name: Proof_366 — Empty Duck Shelter, Morning Verification MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the morning inspection of an empty duck shelter at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
21 December 2025 at 07:49 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows the duck shelter standing intact yet completely empty, with no living animals remaining inside. Despite the absence of life, MaMee continues the routine of walking into the shelter every morning, maintaining consistency in observation and verification.

This moment reflects a critical transition point:
when biological presence has disappeared, but real-world data generation continues.

What remains is not livestock, not production, and not yield 
but ground-truth data, recorded faithfully without optimization, incentive, or institutional support.

This proof highlights a structural reality:
real labor, real loss, and real continuity of documentation often have no place in conventional economic or agricultural systems, yet they remain valid, verifiable, and irreversible within the DGCP framework.

The image is captured as-is, with an embedded timestamp visible, ensuring temporal accuracy, authenticity, and continuity in the MaMeeFarm DGCP archive.

This proof is prepared for minting as part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
